00032 //
00033 // joint parameter accessor methods
00034 //
00035 const base::array<robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters>& GenericSerialManipulator::getParameters() const ///< returns all of manipulator's joint parameters
00036 {
00037   return joints;
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters GenericSerialManipulator::getJoint(Int i) const ///< returns D-H joint parameters for manipulator's ith joint (first joint = 1)
00042 {
00043 #ifdef DEBUG
00044   if (( i < 1 ) || ( i > getNumberOfJoints() )) {
00045     throw std::out_of_range(Exception("Request for joint out of bounds"));
00046   }
00047 #endif
00048 
00049   return joints(i);
00050 }
00051 
00052 //
00053 // joint parameter setter methods
00054 //
00055 void GenericSerialManipulator::setParameters(const robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters& p) ///< sets all of manipulator's joint D-H parameters
00056 { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("unimplemented")); } // !!!implement
00057 
00058 
00059 
00060 void GenericSerialManipulator::setJoint(const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters& j, const Int i) ///< sets D-H joint parameters for manipulator's ith joint (first joint = 1)
00061 {
00062 #ifdef DEBUG
00063   if (( i < 1 ) || ( i > getNumberOfJoints() )) {
00064     throw std::out_of_range(Exception("Request for joint out of bounds"));
00065   }
00066 #endif
00067   joints(i).type = j.type;
00068   joints(i).alpha = j.alpha; 
00069   joints(i).a = j.a;
00070   joints(i).d = j.d;
00071   joints(i).theta = j.theta;
00072 }
